snippet: The deal, if completed, would bolster XL’s property and casualty insurance and reinsurance portfolio and create a combined company worth more than $12 billion.
abstract: The deal, if completed, would bolster XL’s property and casualty insurance and reinsurance portfolio and create a combined company worth more than $12 billion.

headline.main: XL Group Approaches Bermuda Insurer Catlin About Possible Takeover
